title: Executive Order 7393-Amendment of Subdivision XIII, Schedule A, Civil Service Rules
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the provisions of paragraph Eighth of subdivision SECOND of section 2 of the Civil Service Act of January 16, 1883 (22 Stat. 403, 404), Subdivision XIII of Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules is amended by adding thereto the following paragraph:
"4. One special assistant to the Secretary in the Office of the Secretary."
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7393-Amendment of Subdivision XIII, Schedule A, Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/356150
